original_text: And the people of Israel who were present kept the Passover at that time, and the Feast of Unleavened Bread seven days.
korean_text: 그 때에 모인 이스라엘 자손이 유월절을 지키고 이어서 무교절을 칠 일 동안 지켰으니

sentences.original_text: And the people of Israel who were present
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 때에 있던 이스라엘 백성은

sentences.original_text: kept the Passover at that time
and the Feast of Unleavened Bread
